name: GridConfigContext

properties.name: configFilter
properties.description: Provides a way to exclude given parts of the data grid configuration from being persisted. This allows to e.g. provide a grid where column configuration (order, visibility, soritng, custom columns) will be persisted, but filters on columns will be reset next time the grid is used.
properties.rawdescription:
Provides a way to exclude given parts of the data grid configuration from being persisted.
This allows to e.g. provide a grid where column configuration (order, visibility, soritng, custom columns)
will be persisted, but filters on columns will be reset next time the grid is used.

description: Used to provide context data needed for retrieval/storing of grid configuration data.
rawdescription: Used to provide context data needed for retrieval/storing of grid configuration data.
